it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std

Class Bigraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bigraph<Control>, BigraphHandler<Control>, Owner, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Bigraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Bigraph<Control>, java.lang.Cloneable
    Objects created from this class are bigraphs with abstract internal names (i.e. Node equality is reference based) whereas link interfaces still use concrete names. Instances of this class are immutable and can be created by means of the factory methods provided by this class like e.g. makeEmpty(it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Signature), makeId(it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Signature, int, java.lang.String...), compose(it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph), and juxtapose(it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph) ; or from instances of BigraphBuilder.

      • juxtapose

        public static Bigraph juxtapose(Bigraph left,
                Bigraph right)
        Juxtaposes two bigraph. The first argument will be the left operand that is its roots and sites will precede those of the second argument in the outcome.
        Parameters:
        left - the first bigraph.
        right - the second bigraph.
        Returns:
        the juxtaposition of the arguments.

      • compose

        public static Bigraph compose(Bigraph out,
              Bigraph in)
        Composes two bigraphs. The first argument will be the outer bigraph that is the one composed to the outer face of the second argument.
        Parameters:
        out - the outer bigraph
        in - the inner bigraph
        Returns:
        the composition of the arguments.

      • makeEmpty

        public static Bigraph makeEmpty(Signature signature)
        Creates an empty bigraph for the given signature.
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature of the bigraph.
        Returns:
        the empty bigraph.

      • makeId

        public static Bigraph makeId(Signature signature,
             int width,
             java.lang.String... names)
        Creates an identity bigraph i.e. a bigraph without nodes where every site is the only child of the root at the same index and every inner name is the only point of the outer name with the same concrete name.
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature of the bigraph.
        width - the number of roots/sites.
        names - the names of its link faces.
        Returns:
        the resulting identity bigraph.

      • makeId

        public static Bigraph makeId(Signature signature,
             int width,
             java.lang.Iterable<? extends LinkFacet> names)
        Creates an identity bigraph i.e. a bigraph without nodes where every site is the only child of the root at the same index and every inner name is the only point of the outer name with the same concrete name.
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature of the bigraph.
        width - the number of roots/sites.
        names - the set of names that will appear in resulting bigraph's link faces.
        Returns:
        an identity bigraph.
